ComicInfo.Title: Gods of Mars, Part 3: Issus, Goddess of Life Eternal
ComicInfo.Summary: The dreaded moon pirates of Mars are whisking John Carter off to a mysterious and surely unpleasant fate. Along for the ride is Phaidor, a thern princess whose beauty is only matched by her complete lack of humanity. As far as Phaidor is concerned, all life on Mars is beneath the therns, but she's going to get a rude awakening about the ugly truth behind the religion she's believed so blindly for her entire existence. Warlord of Mars #15: Issus, Goddess of Life Eternal. Hell hath no fury like a thern princess scorned!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-10 11:49:09. [CVDB315300]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Joe Jusko, Lucio Parrillo, Stephen Sadowski
ComicInfo.Characters: Carthoris, Issus, John Carter, Phaidor, Thurid, Xodar
ComicInfo.Teams: Black Martians, Plant Men, Red Martians, Tharks, White Apes, White Martians
ComicInfo.Locations: Mars, Sea of Omean, Temple of Issus
